name: kubernets
description: ************* INSTALLATION ************* (Lec-160) 1> Make sure docker should be installed in local. 2> Install cubectl -> This is Kubernetes command-line tool, that allows you to run commands against Kubernetes clusters. 3> Install minikube -> Minikube is a tool that provides an easy means of creating a local Kubernetes environment on any Linux, Mac, or Windows system, where you can experiment with and test Kubernetes deployments.
